articles.title: AI plays an ever-bigger role on college campuses
articles.summary: While universities contemplate artificial intelligence use in the classroom, they are relying on the technology to cut down on operating costs and recoup staff’s time.

articles.title: URI professor developing AI-driven robotics for people with disabilities
